short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display ChatGPT response alongside search engine results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Use OpenAI ChatGPT with Google Search Results 

Features:
* Supports all popular search engines
* Supports official OpenAI API (GPT-3)
* Access ChatGPT from extension popup
* Markdown rendering
* Code highlights
* Dark mode
* Feedback to improve ChatGPT
* Custom trigger mode
* Copy to clipboard
